languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Iconoclast — 5
Servo Skull has +20 Fellowship and Intelligence
While there's at least one ally in Expand area of servoskull, it can't die.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Iconoclast — 5
Servo Skull has +20 Fellowship and Intelligence
While there's at least one ally in Expand area of servoskull, it can't die.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

traits.locale_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — фанатик
Рой сервочерепов получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
Если в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов находится хотя бы один союзник, этот фамильяр не может деактивироваться.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サーヴォスカル・スウォームは+20の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}を得る。
サーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内に少なくとも1体の味方がいる場合、ファミリアは無効化されない。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者が必要

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Hält sich in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm mindestens ein Verbündeter auf, kann der Vertraute nicht deaktiviert werden.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot

If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Hizmelet sürüsü, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde en az bir dost birim varsa iye, devre dışı bırakılamaz.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote.
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.
Si au moins un allié se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, le familier ne peut pas être désactivé.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote.
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +20.
Si au moins un allié se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, le familier ne peut pas être désactivé.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático
El enjambre de servocráneos gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Si hay al menos un aliado en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del enjambre de servocráneos, el familiar no puede quedar inactivo.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot
The servo-skull swarm gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
If there is at least one ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the familiar cannot be deactivated.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático
El enjambre de servocráneos gana +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
Si hay al menos un aliado en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del enjambre de servocráneos, el familiar no puede quedar inactivo.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——狂热者
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高20点。
只要距离伺服头骨集群4格范围内有至少一名盟友，此使仆就不会停止运行。
